posts.post_title: Upgrade Sale... don't need this. SOLD CLOSED.
posts.post_content:
Here is a Lavender Piedmont 350 / Fac 25 that I don't need. Got a upgrade this past weekend.
This card is pretty nice. The only real defect is the pencil mark on the back.

You send me $20 (PP FF) and I'll ship Jimmy to you. He'll be between cardboard, in a bubble envelope and he'll have a tracking number.

Claim on here and shoot me a PM for PP address.
